TITLE: How to avoid a 6-figure tax penalty on foreign bank accounts
SUMMARY: If you have overseas financial accounts, you may need to disclose balances to the U.S. Department of the Treasury by April 15 or incur a steep tax penalty.

TITLE: Russian oligarch Abramovich's two superyachts worth a combined $1 billion are escaping sanctions — for now
SUMMARY: The azure waters of southwest Turkey saw the arrival of a two multimillion-dollar superyachts this week reportedly belonging to Russian oligarch Roman Abramovich.

TITLE: UK government budget gives little relief to young people squeezed by cost of living crisis
SUMMARY: In his Spring Statement, U.K. Finance Minister Rishi Sunak acknowledged that the Russia-Ukraine war was putting more pressure on the cost of living in Britain.

TITLE: Apple co-founder Steve Wozniak: 'Of all Big Tech, Facebook is No. 1 that I don't like'
SUMMARY: Steve Wozniak, inventor of the first commercial PC, says he recently deactivated his Facebook account — and he doesn't trust the platform's privacy standards.

TITLE: Inflation is spiking the cost of pet parenthood yet owners are still splurging on care
SUMMARY: More than 70% of dog owners are feeling the sting of inflation when spending on food and supplies. But many are still willing to splurge, a report shows.

TITLE: Warren Buffett paid $11.6 billion for a company run by his 'long-time friend' — here's why he values trust so much
SUMMARY: Warren Buffett views trust and "integrity" as essential in the workplace. That's likely why he seems confident that Berkshire Hathaway's latest acquisition will succeed.

TITLE: Op-ed: Why investors should care about who owns their advisor's firm
SUMMARY: There are many factors to consider when selecting a financial advisor, from acumen to personal chemistry. Also important: who actually owns the advisor's firm.

TITLE: Buying your first home? Here's what you need to know
SUMMARY: People looking to buy a home for the first time face a steep learning curve. Here are some of the basics from experts in the field.

TITLE: Oligarch Roman Abramovich's $50 million Colorado mansion could become a sanctions target
SUMMARY: A Rocky Mountain mansion owned by Russian oligarch Roman Abramovich would likely be among the first assets frozen by the U.S. government if he is sanctioned.

TITLE: Check out this 'insanely great' offer letter Steve Jobs wrote to hire an employee – who now regrets turning him down
SUMMARY: In the 1980s, the Apple co-founder offered an $80,000 salary to a former colleague while trying to convince him to work at his new start-up. Now, the recipient says he regrets turning Jobs down.

TITLE: Meet Erin Collins, National Taxpayer Advocate for the IRS
SUMMARY: Erin Collins, the national taxpayer advocate, fights for systemic changes within the IRS. Here’s what to know about the Taxpayer Advocate Service.

TITLE: The IRS has delivered more than 45 million tax refunds. This is the average payment
SUMMARY: The IRS has issued more than 45 million refunds worth almost $152 billion, as of March 11. Here's the average payment.

TITLE: Mark Zuckerberg’s advice for young people: Focus more on building relationships than being 'objective focused'
SUMMARY: On a March episode of Lex Fridman's podcast, the Meta CEO explained why he thinks college students should be selective about who they hang out with.

TITLE: The 4 types of vacations that may be hard to book in 2022
SUMMARY: After two years of vacation plans being halted by Covid-19, travelers are beginning to regain their confidence and are booking holidays up to a year in advance.

TITLE: Americans are pausing investments because of the Russia-Ukraine war. Here's what it could cost them
SUMMARY: The ongoing Russia-Ukraine war is hurting Americans' financial outlook, causing many to pause investing, according to a survey. Here's why that's a problem.

TITLE: A million new millionaires were created in U.S. last year, and the richest got richer, report says
SUMMARY: The roaring stock market and crypto gains created more than a million new millionaires in the U.S. last year, according to a new report.

TITLE: Steve Wozniak's best investing tips – and why he’s ‘very skeptical’ of most cryptocurrencies
SUMMARY: Steve Wozniak is a famously cautious investor who hates owning stocks. He also stars in online reality investing show "Unicorn Hunters." Here's how he weighs his decisions.

TITLE: Inflation is causing some older Americans to delay retirement plans, survey shows
SUMMARY: Inflation is causing some older Americans to postpone major life events, including retirement, according to a Nationwide survey.

TITLE: Theranos saga returns to courtroom as Holmes' top deputy Balwani set for criminal trial
SUMMARY: Ramesh "Sunny" Balwani, Elizabeth Holmes' ex-boyfriend and business partner, is set to face the jury in his criminal fraud trial this week.

TITLE: Eligible taxpayers can claim earned income tax credit in these states
SUMMARY: More than a dozen states added or expanded earned income tax credits in 2021. Here's what to know about this write-off for low to moderate earners.

TITLE: Bipartisan group of lawmakers pushes IRS for answers on 'numerous problems' facing taxpayers
SUMMARY: A group of bipartisan lawmakers is pressing the IRS for answers regarding "numerous" concerns amid a challenging tax season.

TITLE: Almost 90% of Americans are able to erase this $30 credit card fee just by asking. Here's what to say when you call
SUMMARY: Many credit card issuers will waive a late fee if you simply call and ask, experts say. Here's what to say to boost your odds of success.

TITLE: Brits offered £350 a month to house Ukraine refugees, Benedict Cumberbatch plans to take part
SUMMARY: "Doctor Strange" star Cumberbatch told Sky News on Sunday that "everyone needs to do as much as they can" to support Ukrainians.

TITLE: Cash-rich states create 'competitive environment’ with flurry of tax cuts

TITLE: 'Golden passports' for the rich face new restrictions in global crackdown on Russian oligarchs
SUMMARY: Sweeping sanctions against Putin's oligarchs has led governments to limit and in some cases end their lucrative pay-for-passport programs.

TITLE: Retirees likely shielded from inflation hit on these expenses, report finds
SUMMARY: Annual inflation rose by 7.9% in February, but some retirees may not feel the brunt of certain rising costs, according to a J.P. Morgan report.

TITLE: This country regularly tops the Philippines’ tourist arrivals — and it’s not China
SUMMARY: Residents from South Korea topped the list of visitor arrivals to the Philippines each year from 2010 to 2020, according to the Philippines' tourism department.

TITLE: Here's what happens to Russian oligarch yachts after they're seized
SUMMARY: European governments that seized the yachts and villas of Russian oligarchs now face a more difficult question: What to do with them?

TITLE: Here’s how urban and rural Americans build wealth differently
SUMMARY: There are key differences between rural and urban Americans when it comes to building wealth. Here's how it may affect retirement.

TITLE: Britain impounds private jet with suspected links to Russian oligarch amid new aviation sanctions
SUMMARY: The U.K. on Wednesday impounded a private jet connected to Russian oligarch Roman Abramovich under new aviation sanctions levied at the pariah state.
